Student.title: Student
Student.description: Represents a student with their associated information.

id.description: The student's ID number, used as the document ID.

name.description: The full name of the student.

branch.description: The branch of study for the student.

Hall.title: Hall
Hall.description: Represents a hall or room where exams take place.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Hall entity, used as document ID.

name.description: The name or identifier of the hall (e.g., Hall A, Room 101).

capacity.description: The maximum number of students that can be seated in the hall.

rows.description: Number of rows in the hall.

cols.description: Number of columns in the hall.

/halls/{hallId}.description: Stores information about each hall. Managed by authenticated users.

/students/{studentId}.description: Stores information about each student. Managed by authenticated users.
